DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the fitting characteristics and physiological response of two toric lenses manufactured by Vistakon.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Performance of Atypical Contact Lens Powers on Subjects With Astigmatism
DOC.criteria: Able to wear study lenses in parameters available. At least 18 understand and sign informed consent willing to follow the protocol achieve at least 6/9 Visual Acuity (VA), both eyes (OU) with study lenses hyperopes: +2.00 to +4.00 with 0.75 D cylinder around 180, high myopes: 6.00 to 8.00 with 1.25 D cylinder around 180 oblique axis: 2.00 to 4.00 with 0.75 D cyl around 45 or 135, have worn Soft Contact Lenses's within last 6 months Any ocular or systemic disorder which may contraindicate Contact Lens (CL) wear any topical ocular medication aphakic corneal refractive surgery, corneal distortion from hard CL wear or keratoconus pregnant or lactating grade 2 or worse slit lamp signs infectious disease previous clinical study within 2 weeks don't agree to participate
